command: $photo = @{ albumId=1; title="Logo Grid Sample"; url="https://images.example.com/portfolio/logo-grid.png"; thumbnailUrl="https://images.example.com/portfolio/logo-grid-thumb.png" } | ConvertTo-Json; Invoke-RestMethod -Method Post -Uri "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/photos" -ContentType "application/json; charset=UTF-8" -Body $photo | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5
explanation: Adds portfolio images to provide tangible artifacts that support the persona’s narrative.
rationale_steps: Prepare image metadata pointing to example image URLs.
POST to the placeholder photo endpoint to emulate media population with JSON return.
